The biggest StarkNet event in Asia 🤯 Bengaluru — Nov 30 - Dec 1 ⏱ A two-day event that will be a mix of talks, panels, hacking, and brainstorming...
entry.summary: The biggest StarkNet event in Asia 🤯 Bengaluru — Nov 30 - Dec 1 ⏱ A two-day event that will be a mix of talks, panels, hacking, and brainstorming on ZK and Cairo (the base language of StarkNet). 🔥 Registration is now open ⚡️ Starknet.cc (Bangalore 🇮🇳 Nov 30 - Dec 1): ZK, Cairo, StarkNet, and Ethereum curious chads!! Get ready for the biggest StarkNet event in Asia. The StarkNet community will take over Bengaluru from Nov 30 - Dec 1. Register to participate- Follow this thread 🧵 to learn more about what to expect 👇 https://starknet-cc.devfolio.co/

entry.title: RT Stef(🧱,🚀): Update...we won a bounty from @xmtp_!! 🎉🎉🎉 Next level shipping 🚀 A group of women in tech from @herdaolatam @Web3Famil...
entry.summary: RT Stef(🧱,🚀) Update...we won a bounty from @xmtp_!! 🎉🎉🎉 Next level shipping 🚀 A group of women in tech from @herdaolatam @Web3Familia and @developer_dao Plus different parts of the world Peru, Spain, and America. I don't speak Spanish and they do😅 Stef(🧱,🚀): First in-person web3 hackathon with @ETHGlobal for #ETHSanFrancisco2022 🚀 Built so much in a short time with this amazing team from @herdaolatam 💫 Built a platform to assist people that are victims of sexual assault on college campuses.
